Dialogue.Page: Daylight Savings is a mod made for the first Outer Wilds Mod Jam, which explores a new star system with a planet and a few structures in orbit around a seemingly dim star.
It follows a story with a clan of Nomai discovering a star aside a pulsar, which led to some events that create the dim star seen in the system.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
